timeline.bodyText:
I'd prefer a description closer to this:
"bungeeguard": Forward player IPs and UUIDs in a format supported by
               the BungeeGuard plugin. Use this if you run servers
               using Minecraft 1.12 and below, are on a shared
               host, and would like to use BungeeGuard to provide
               additional security.

I'd prefer if this was made a bit more concise, though.
